titles: The triumphs of love and constancy a romance, containing the heroick amours of Theagenes & Chariclea : in ten books / the first five rendred by a person of quality, the last five by N. Tate.
author: Heliodorus, of Emesa.
Person of quality.
Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.
publisher: Printed by J. Leake for Edward Poole ...,
notes: Issued in 1886 with title: The Ethiopian history of Heliodorus.
Attributed to Heliodorus of Emesa. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
